name: Freedom's Call
description:
Freedom's Call is an RPG focused on Exploration, Tactical Combat and Engaging Stories.

Players take on the role of Quinn, Crown Prince of Orad, alongside his closest companions: Galahad, Date, and Rene, as they travel the Kingdom of Orad fulfilling a sacred duty: 

Hunting the Four Primals - destructive creatures who arise every generation and leave havoc in their wake.

However, as they set upon their journey, Quinn will start to uncover truths, both about the nature of the Primals and of his father before him, that will shake him to his very core.

Freedom’s Call is fundamentally a story of self-discovery for our four protagonists, each of whom must reckon with their place in the world and the responsibilities that come with it.

--------------

Featuring:

  • A world filled with fun, imaginative characters
  • Nail-biting combat which rewards thinking ahead
  • A calendar and time of day system
  • 20+ original compositions for the demo alone
  • Several optional bonus areas to explore and characters to meet

------------

GAMEPLAY

Freedom's Call is all about adventure and exploration; no one's marked the Primals on a map for you! To hunt the Primals down you'll have to scour maps, gather tips from NPCs and traverse alternative routes to destinations.

What also separates Freedom's Call from other RPGs is the TACTICS system. Combat is fast and deadly, to survive, each character must cycle between their two TACTICS, different classes which allow the character to access alternative move-sets. Most encounters operate like a puzzle which the player must solve.

This demo covers the intro of the game, in which we are introduced to Quinn and his friends.

--------------

Controls:

  • Keyboard and Gamepad accessible
  • WASD and Arrow Keys available
  • E to confirm, Q to cancel an action
  • Options and further controls available by pressing the Escape Key
